message: Let's start fair. I take the bigger share, but you still get a decent amount. Accept this and we can both be happy.
You took a big share last round, now it's my turn to be greedy!
Okay, I see your point about being greedy, but we need to split this fairly. Let's both take a larger share than last time, this is getting a bit risky.
I'm not getting any younger, I want a bigger share now, but I'm willing to compromise
